intro.description:
This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to define a plug-in based product configuration for an RCP application and run an RCP application product using PDE.
To learn more about using cheat sheets, click the help button in the top right corner (?).

item.title: Open the plug-in development perspective
item.description:
To open the plug-in development perspective, select Window->Open Perspective->Other... and choose Plug-in Development.
Alternatively, click the following button to perform the task.

item.title: Create the product configuration
item.description: To create the product configuration, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select "File->New->Product Configuration" from the main menu
Select "com.example.rcpapp" in the resulting "New Product Configuration" wizard page
Input "rcpapp.product" into the "File name" text box
Select the "Use a launch configuration" radio button inside the "Initialize the file content" group and verify that "com.example.rcpapp.application" is selected in the combo box. Click "Finish"

item.title: Open the product editor
item.description:
To open the product editor (if it is not already open), expand the com.example.rcpapp tree dialog in the Package Explorer view and double-click on the rcpapp.product file (the Overview page should be open initially).
Alternatively, click the following button to perform the task.

item.title: Define the product
item.description: To define the product, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Click the "New..." button next to the "Product ID" drop down menu to open the "New Product Definition" dialog box
Input "RCP Application" into the "Product Name" text box
Verify "com.example.rcpapp" is the value entered for the "Defining Plug-in" text box
Verify "product" is the value entered for the "Product ID" text box

item.title: Synchronize the product configuration with the defining plug-in
item.description:
Product configurations and their constituent files may become unsynchronized. This situation is apparent when changes made using the product editor are not reflected in the application.
To synchronize the product configuration with the defining plug-in, click the Synchronize hyperlink under the Testing heading on the product editor Overview page.
Note: PDE automatically synchronizes the product configuration when the Launch an Eclipse Application hyperlinks under the Testing heading are used.

item.title: Run the RCP product
item.description: To run the RCP product, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Click the "Launch an Eclipse application" hyperlink under the "Testing" heading
Note: "RCP Application" now shows up in the window title bar
